      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Future 3: Will</string>
            <string language="en">Future 3: Will</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zukunft 3: Wille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Futur 3 : Volonté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Futuro 3: Vontade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Futuro 3: Volontà</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέλλον 3:</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Futuro 3: Voluntad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">“Will” is another word you can use to talk about the future. In this exercise you practise the use of “will” by filling in the blanks.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">"Will" is another word you can use to talk about the future. In this exercise you practice the use of "will" by filling in the blanks. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">verb</string>
            <string language="sv">the future tense</string>
            <string language="sv">will</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">verb</string>
            <string language="en">the future's</string>
            <string language="en">will</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"werden Sie" ist ein anderes Wort, das Sie 
verwenden können, um sich mit der Zukunft zu befassen. In 
dieser Übung üben Sie den Gebrauch "werden", indem Sie die 
Leerzeichen ausfüllen. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für 
Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"" est un autre mot que vous pouvez employer pour
parler du futur. Dans cet exercice vous pratiquez l'utilisation 
de "" en complétant les blancs. Safir - l'anglais et vie active
pour des débutants - module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"" é uma outra palavra que você pode se usar 
falar sobre o futuro. Neste exercício você pratica o uso de ""
enchendo nos espaços em branco. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"" è un'altra parola che potete usare per 
parlare del futuro. In questa esercitazione vi esercitate 
nell'uso di "" riempiendosi negli spazii in bianco. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa 
gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"" Είναι μια άλλη λέξη που μπορείτε να 
χρησιμοποιήσετε για να μιλήσετε για το μέλλον. Σε αυτήν την 
άσκηση ασκείτε τη χρήση "" με να συμπληρώσετε τα κενά. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους -
ενότητα 6 - τι θα θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">"" es otra palabra que usted puede utilizar para 
hablar del futuro. En este ejercicio usted practica el uso de ""
completando los espacios en blanco. ¿Safir - inglés y vida 
laboral para los principiantes - módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
